summary: Newcomer Will Lockhart defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.
cast: James Stewart|Arthur Kennedy|Donald Crisp|Cathy O'Donnell|Alex Nicol|Aline MacMahon|Wallace Ford|Jack Elam|John War Eagle|James Millican|Gregg Barton|Boyd Stockman|Frank DeKova|Beulah Archuletta|Jack Carry|Bill Catching|Frank Cordell|Kay Koury|Frosty Royce|Eddy Waller
title: El hombre de Laramie
